title: Cover Picture and Issue Information
content:
Cover image: Yellow-necked mouse (Apodemus flavicollis) in a mixed European beech/Douglas-fir forest. Beech seeds were overwhelmingly preferred by rodents compared to conifer seeds in mixed forests. (pp. 1944–1954).

Photo: © Scott Appleby.
siteTitle: Wiley: Journal of Applied Ecology: Table of Contents
